contactMessage: I am available to work any kind of web development projects on hourly or project based. Contact me though WhatsApp or Email.
roles: I Build APIs That Handle Millions of Requests
I Turn Complex Problems Into Clean Architecture
I Deliver Remote, Async, on Time ‚Äî Every Time

valueProps.text: System design for scale from day one

features.title: System Design & Architecture
features.desc: I design scalable, fault-tolerant system architectures using modern design patterns, distributed system principles, and performance optimization strategies. Experienced in building production-ready systems that scale reliably.

features.title: Scalable Backend Engineering
features.desc: Specialized in building high-performance REST APIs using Node.js, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. Focused on clean architecture, modular codebases, caching strategies, and handling high-volume concurrent traffic.

features.title: Modern Frontend with Next.js
features.desc: I build fast, SEO-optimized, and accessible web applications using Next.js and TypeScript. Experienced with server components, static generation, performance optimization, and production-grade UI architecture.

features.title: Database Design & Optimization
features.desc: Strong expertise in relational database design using PostgreSQL, query optimization, indexing strategies, schema planning, and ensuring data consistency and integrity in scalable applications.

features.title: AI Integration & Automation
features.desc: Experience integrating AI-powered solutions including LLM APIs, intelligent automation workflows, and data-driven features into modern applications to enhance user experience and business efficiency.

features.title: Cloud & DevOps Practices
features.desc: Skilled in deploying scalable applications using CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and cloud-based infrastructure. Focused on performance monitoring, reliability, and secure production deployments.

works.title: ASL Squads - Tournament
works.desc: Developed a full-featured youth tournament management platform using Next.js, Nest.js, and GraphQL. Solved real-time match updates, player management, and team ranking automation, helping organizers save hours of manual work while providing a smooth user experience.
features: Real-time match updates with WebSocket integration
Player ranking automation to simplify tournament management
Captain login system for team-level control
Admin dashboard for event and sponsor management
Drag-and-drop squad assignment and hierarchy management

works.title: Freelance Marketplace
works.desc: Built a full-featured freelance marketplace with React.js, Node.js, and Sequelize, solving user workflow challenges by providing dashboards, admin panels, and AWS-powered file uploads. Simplified project management and improved client satisfaction with a professional marketplace platform.
features: User dashboards for freelancers and clients
Wishlist, messaging, and contact features for improved engagement
Admin panel to manage users and projects efficiently
File uploads to AWS S3 for seamless document handling
Email notifications to keep users informed

works.title: Furniture Ecommerce
works.desc: Developed a custom furniture ecommerce platform using Django REST Framework and Nuxt.js. Solved seamless online shopping challenges by integrating secure payments, dynamic product catalog, and inventory management, improving sales efficiency and user satisfaction.
features: Secure backend with Django REST Framework for scalable API
Dynamic product catalog with filtering and search
Nuxt.js frontend for fast and responsive UI
Inventory and stock management automation
CI/CD deployment pipeline for continuous updates

works.title: Financial website for saving
works.desc: Created a LAMP-based financial savings platform with PHP and MySQL. Solved user management and pack creation challenges, enabling secure membership, leader selection, and pack tracking to help users manage their finances efficiently.
features: User authentication and secure login
Admin panel for pack and membership management
Multi-lingual support for wider audience reach
Pack creation and leader selection automation
User dashboard for easy savings tracking

works.title: Cost Calculation
works.desc: Built a fast cost estimation tool using FastAPI and Vanilla JavaScript. Solved manual calculation issues for agencies by providing instant, accurate cost calculations, improving decision-making speed for clients and internal teams.
features: Instant cost calculation for service requests
User-friendly interface for agencies and clients
Accurate backend calculations with FastAPI
MongoDB storage for reusable cost templates
Real-time estimation updates for efficiency

works.title: Discord Bot
works.desc: Developed a Discord Bot using Python and FastAPI that automates Guesty task interactions. Solved repetitive task issues, enabling members to complete processes efficiently via Discord channels, increasing productivity and engagement.
features: Automates repetitive tasks in Discord channels
Integrates with Guesty for task management
Fast and reliable bot responses
Linux server deployment for stability
Enhances team productivity and engagement

works.title: Sports Blog
works.desc: Developed a custom WordPress theme from scratch. Solved content management and styling challenges, enabling a professional blogging platform with SEO-friendly features, fully responsive design, and easy content publishing.
features: Custom WordPress theme development
SEO-friendly blog structure
Fully responsive design for mobile and desktop
Easy content publishing and management
Professional layout and typography

works.title: Ponditi Learning Platform
works.desc: Built a scalable learning platform using Node.js, Next.js, and Socket.io. Solved real-time tutoring and communication challenges, providing user dashboards, admin panel, and role-based access control to enhance learning efficiency.
features: Role-based JWT user authentication
Real-time tutoring with Socket.io
Student-teacher search and request system
User and admin dashboards for full control
Hourly and monthly tutoring session management

works.title: Email Template Building
works.desc: Created a Node.js platform for building, customizing, and exporting email templates. Solved repetitive template creation problems and automated AWS image uploads, enhancing marketing workflow efficiency.
features: Email template creation and customization
Preview, save, and export templates
Automated image uploads to AWS S3
Simplifies repetitive marketing tasks
Efficient backend processing with Node.js

works.title: Tournament Website
works.desc: Developed a tournament management platform using Node.js, React.js, and MongoDB. Solved multi-round tournament challenges with team management, ranking, and score updates, helping organizers run events smoothly while providing participants with real-time feedback.
features: Multi-round tournament management
Random and ranking-based team assignments
Real-time score updates and leaderboard
Admin panel for tournament control
User authentication and secure access

education.title: Bachelor of business administration
education.desc: I pursued my Bachelor of Business Administration at Daffodil International University from 2016 to 2020. During this time, I maintained a commendable academic performance, achieving a score of 3.05 out of 4.

education.title: Higher Secondary School Certificate
education.desc: I completed my Higher Secondary School Certificate at Singra Damdama Pilot School & College from 2013 to 2015, achieving a score of 3.33 out of 5. This period of my education was instrumental in shaping my academic foundation and facilitating my transition to higher studies.

education.title: Secondary School Certificate
education.desc: I successfully completed my Secondary School Certificate at Singra Damdama Pilot School & College from 2008 to 2013, securing a commendable score of 3.63 out of 5. It was during these years that I began to develop a deeper understanding of various subjects and started to chart my path towards higher education and future endeavors.

testimonial.comments: This was the best experience I have had with any freelancer. Incredibly skilled and hardworking. Extremely responsive and passionate about your project. Through this experience with him I consider him a friend and a partner more than a freelancer. 10/10 work, effort, everything. So thankful for being able to have worked with him and I plan on working with him again in the future.
Great programmer, excellent at what he does and very respectful!

testimonial.project: Front-end Development With Adobe AE Animation
testimonial.comments: Shayon is one of the most friendly freelancers I have ever met. He was very forgiving as remained out of touch for a very long time due to personal reasons. In terms of work - he turned it around very quickly and very professionally. I highly recommend Shayon to anybody looking for a web developer and designer. Thank you Shayon !

Great work on the recent project. The developer has shown a strong understanding of the programming language and technologies used, and was able to implement the required features effectively. The code is well-organized and easy to understand, making it easy for others to maintain. The developer also effectively communicated with the team and was able to meet deadlines. Overall, a valuable asset to the team and I look forward to working with him on future projects.

testimonial.project: Agency Web APP & CI/CD Hosting setup
testimonial.comments: The best developer I have worked with. He is always on top of things and was able to resolve any and every issue that may have arose, very quickly. Excellent communication and he writes extremely good code and makes beautiful work. My favorite freelancer I have worked with.
Very talented web designer, will use again, thanks for dedication.
